These files have been attached to your: These files have been attached to your submission by the recipients.
A query on the database resulted in an i: A query on the database resulted in an integrity error:
A useful way to hide your key code is to: A useful way to hide your key code is to write it down like a credit card number, i.e. by also including an expiration date.
Access to the whistleblower's identity h: Zahtevek za dostop do identitete žvižgača je bil posredovan skrbniku.
Allow access to public resources via HTT: Omogoči dostop do javnih virov preko HTTPS
Allow other websites to include the plat: Dovoli drugim spletnim stranem, da prikazujejo to platformo v iframe okvirjih.
Allow recipients to grant permissions to: Omogoči prejemnikom odobritev dostopa žvižgačem do izbranih prispevkov
Allow recipients to upload files for whi: Allow recipients to upload files for whistleblowers
Allow selection of this context through: Allow selection of this context through the context selector.
Allow the recipient to delete submission: Allow the recipient to delete submissions
Allow the recipient to grant permissions: Omogoči prejemniku odobritev dostopa žvižgaču do izbranih prispevkov
Allow the recipient to postpone the subm: Allow the recipient to postpone the submission expiration date
Allow the whistleblower to add attachmen: Dovoli žvižgačem dodajanje prilog k prispevkom
Allow to advance through submission step: Allow to advance through submission steps only when current step is completed
Allow whistleblowers to add attachments: Dovoli žvižgačem dodajanje prilog k obstoječim prispevkom
Allow whistleblowers to select their rec: Allow whistleblowers to select their recipients
Amount of days till whistleblower access: Število dni do preteka žvižgačevega dostopa
Are you sure that you want to delete all: Ali ste prepričani, de želite izbrisati izbrane prispevke?
Are you sure that you want to delete the: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati kontekst?
Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati prispevek ?
Ali ste prepričani da želite izbrisati uporabnika ?
Are you sure that you want to postpone t: Are you sure that you want to postpone the expiration date for all selected submissions?
Are you sure that you want to postpone the submission expiration date?
Are you sure that you wish to continue?: Ali ste prepričani, da želite nadaljevati?
Body of the confirmation question upon n: Body of the confirmation question upon negative answer
By confirming, you will postpone the exp: S potrditvijo, prelagate rok veljavnosti do:
By enabling this option, the system will: Če boste omogočili to možnost, bo sistem shranjeval prejete datoteke nešifrirano na vašem vozlišču.
By enabling this option, you are allowin: By enabling this option, you are allowing other websites to include the platform inside iframes; this could potentially be used to endanger the platform or intercept users' communications
Contexts are the categories to be select: Contexts are the categories to be selected by whistleblowers, when they perform their submission. Make sure to make them pertinent to your project.
Deny the whistleblower to add attachment: Onemogoči žvižgaču dodajanje prilog k prispevku
Describe your submission in a few words: V nekaj besedah opišite vaš prispevek
Disable the security awareness panel que: Onemogoči vprašanja na pultu o varnostni ozaveščenosti
Do you want to provide your identificati: Ali želite navesti podatke o vaši identiteti?
Downloading a file with malicious conten: Downloading a file with malicious content could compromise your computer or disclose your identity.
Odloži datoteke tukaj ali klikni prenos.
Drop the public PGP key here or click to: Drop the public PGP key here or click to upload.
Enable HTTP Basic Authentication to limi: Enable HTTP Basic Authentication to limit platform access
Enable insecure configuration without PG: Omogoči nezaščiteno delovanje brez PGP šifriranja
Enter the email address used to notify t: Enter the email address used to notify the recipient
Enter the number of score points to be a: Enter the number of score points to be assigned when this option is selected:
Error while uploading files; check below: Napaka v prenosu datotek; preveri podrobnosti spodaj.
Every event related to a new or updated: Every event related to a new or updated submission will trigger an email with a link to it.
Everything related to the submission sto: Vsi s prispevkom povezani podatki bodo izbrisani.
Files uploaded here are made available f: Files uploaded here are made available for the whistleblower and other recipients to download.
Follow us on Twitter if you like to be p: Sledite nam na Twitterju, če želite biti pod drobnogledom NSA:
For more information, log in to the Admi: For more information, log in to the Administration interface and look at the “System Stats” and “Anomalies” sections.
For security reasons the whistleblower a: For security reasons the whistleblower access is subject to expiration.
For security reasons, as a matter of dat: Zaradi varnosti, kot predmet politike o varovanju podatkov, platforma samodejno briše prispevke in povezane podatke po določenem času.
For technical support inquiries you can: Za tehnično podporo lahko zaprosite, tako da nam pišete na:
Prosimo počakajte, da prične ponovno delovati
Give your whistleblowing project a good: Give your whistleblowing project a good name and description to invite whistleblowers to submit. Be sure to make the goals of your project clear.
GlobaLeaks technology includes a server: GlobaLeaks technology includes a server status checking component which will alert you in case something requires your attention.
Guidelines on how to start up Whistleblo: Smernice, kako začeti z žvižgaško pobudo
Have you already filed a submission? Ent: Ali ste že oddali naznanitev? Vnesite vašo šifro ključa.
Hint shown on the button for adding an a: Hint shown on the button for adding an additional answer
Hint: How to hide your key code: Namig, kako skriti vašo šifro ključa
HTTPS does not protect the content of my: HTTPS ne zaščiti vsebine moje naznanitve niti ne zakrije moje identitete
HTTPS does protect both my identity and: HTTPS zakrije mojo identiteto in zaščiti vsebino moje naznanitve
HTTPS protects my identity, but not the: HTTPS zakrije mojo identiteto, toda ne zaščiti vsebine moje naznanitve
HTTPS protects the content of my leak bu: HTTPS zaščiti vsebino moje naznanitve, toda ne zakrije moje identitete
I've solved the math challenge, hide thi: Rešil sem matematično nalogo, skrij zdaj to reč!
If disabled, submissions for this contex: If disabled, submissions for this context will only be accessible through a direct link to it.
If you don’t mind and would rather recei: If you don’t mind and would rather receive such a large number of email notifications anyhow, please contact your technical support to have them modify this setting accordingly.
If you want to tell us more about your p: Če bi nam želeli povedati več o svojem projektu ali potrebujete pomoč, nam lahko pišete na:
Invalid format for hidden service (simil: Neveljaven naslov skrite storitve (moral bi biti videti kot: http://sestnajst1znakov.onion)
Invalid format for public site (similar: Neveljaven naslov javne strani (moral bi biti videti kot: http://sestnajst1znakov.tor2web.org)
It appears that %NodeName% is receiving: Izgleda, da %NodeName% prejema veliko število prispevkov.
It appears that you are browsing this si: Videti je kot da ne uporabljate ničesar, kar bi zaščitilo komunikacijo in varovalo vašo identiteto!
It appears that you are using Tor. To be: Videti je, kot da uporabljate Tor. Da bi bolje varovali vašo identiteto, poskrbite, da uporabljate Tor Browser.
Just to prove you are human, please answ: Da bi dokazali, da ste človek, rešite slednjo matematično nalogo:
Label: Oznaka
Limit for multi-line inputs, in characte: Limit for multi-line inputs, in characters
Limit for single-line inputs, in charact: Limit for single-line inputs, in characters
List of access requests to whistleblower: Seznam zahtevkov za dostop do identitete žvižgačev
Log in and check it out before it's too: Prijavite se v sistem in preverite informacije preden bo prepozno!
Maximum emails per hour before triggerin: Maksimalno število elektronskih sporočil na uro, preden se aktivira zapora pošte
Message shown on top of the status page: Message shown on top of the status page of the submission
Minimum time before accepting a submissi: Minimum time before accepting a submission, in seconds
Name: Ime
New request of access to a whistleblower: Nov zahtevek za dostop do identitete žvižgača
No context was found for the specified I: No context was found for the specified ID
No file was found for the specified ID: No file was found for the specified ID
No Recipient was found for the specified: Noben prejemnik ni bil najden s tem ID-jem
no stats available for current hour; che: Ni razpoložljivih statistik za to uro; preverite stran dejavnosti.
No submission was found for the specifie: No submission was found for the specified ID
No Submission was found for the specifie: Nobena naznanitev ni bila najdena z navedenim ID
Notification of mailing system suspensio: Notification of mailing system suspension after hourly limit excess
Now type your password, then click 'Log: Zdaj vpišite svoje geslo, nato kliknite "Prijavi":
Number of hours before sending a submiss: Število ur pred pošiljanjem obvestila o poteku prispevka
One or more of the recipients of this su: One or more of the recipients of this submission has not configured a PGP key.
Organization unit and job location at th: Organizacijska enota in lokacija dela ob poročanju
Please be aware that everything stored o: Vse podatke, ki so hranjeni izven platforme, na primer priloge prenešene na vaš računalnik, je potrebno izbrisati ročno.
Please check your key code and try again: Preverite vašo šifro ključa in poizkusite ponovno ali pa pričnite z novo naznanitvijo.
Please configure your PGP keys in the re: Please configure your PGP keys in the recipient preferences page.
Please consider asking your technical su: Please consider asking your technical support to add more server disk space.
Please make sure that all related data i: Please make sure that all related data is properly deleted so that the recipients won't be able to further access to it.
Please note that all the associated data: Please note that all the associated data will be permanently lost.
Please review the following information: Please review the following information and decide if you wish to proceed.
Please support Hermes through their dona: Prosimo, da podprete Hermes na naši strani za donacije.
Please write a motivation for the reply: Please write a motivation for the reply
Reception of this email indicates that t: Reception of this email indicates that the server was able to authenticate to and interact with the SMTP mail server.
Recipients are very important for a whis: Recipients are very important for a whistleblowing project. They are the people responsible for receiving the whistleblowers' submissions, verifying their authenticity and for taking action too. Choose them wisely.
Remember to provide proper security advi: Ne pozabite poučiti žvižgačev o njihovi varnosti:
Request access to the whistleblower's id: Zahtevek za dostop do identitete žvižgača
Require at least one file to be uploaded: Vsaj ena datoteka mora biti naložena
Reset notification templates to default: Ponastavi obvestilne predloge na privzeto obliko
Resource can only be accessed via the To: Ta vir je dostopen le prek Tor omrežja
Search engine spiders will be allowed to: Pajki iskalnikov bodo lahko iskali po tej aplikaciji.
Select the question to be triggered when: Select the question to be triggered when this option is selected
Select the step to be triggered when thi: Select the step to be triggered when this option is selected
Pošlji testno elektronsko sporočilo na svoj naslov.
Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes t:
Sending submissions over HTTPS exposes the act of doing so, but not the content.

Also, hiding the fact that you are submitting something makes the submission anonymous, which is strongly recommended.

This can be achieved with the use of the Tor Browser, providing anonymisation not found in other browsers like Internet Explorer, Firefox, Chrome, Opera etc.
Server temporarly unusable due to resour: Vozlišče je trenutno neuporabno zaradi preobremenjenosti; opozorite administratorja, če imate to možnost.
Set a PGP public key for encryption of e: Set a PGP public key for encryption of email notifications
Set up encryption by providing a PGP pub: Nastavi šifriranje z zagotovitvijo tvojega javnega PGP ključa
Show recipient details on the status pag: Show recipient details on the status page of the submission
Show small context cards on submission i: Show small context cards on submission interface
Show small recipient cards on submission: Prikaži majhne kartice prejemnikov v vmesniku za naznanitve
Subject answer visibility to custodian a: Subject answer visibility to custodian authorization
Submission does not pass the field valid: Submission does not pass the field validation
Template for summary of contents in subm: Template for summary of contents in submission archive
Text shown on top of the interface for s: Text shown on top of the interface for selecting contexts
Besedilo na vrhu vmesnika izbire prejemnikov
Text shown when the whistleblower is not: Besedilo, ki bo prikazano, če se uporabnik ne povezuje prek Tor omrežja
Text shown when the whistleblower is usi: Besedilo, ki bo prikazano, če se uporabnik povezuje prek Tor omrežja
The activities with unusual stats are:: The activities with unusual stats are:
The answers to the following questions a: The answers to the following questions are either missing or invalid:
The chosen password is too weak. Make it: The chosen password is too weak. Make it more secure by adding special characters, numbers, and unusual symbols.
The connection used to send this submiss: Povezava uporabljena za ta prispevek je bila varovana s HTTPS in omogoča zaupnost.
Povezava uporabljena za ta prispevek je bila varovana s TOR in omogoča zaupnost ter anonimnost.
The experimental features may be less st: The experimental features may be less stable or even not work at all; enable this option at your own risk. Support for these features may vary and they may be removed in the future.
The file is unavailable due to an intern: Ta datoteka ni dostopna zaradi interne napake.
The file will be available at URL: /s/$f: Datoteka bo na voljo na povezavi: /s/$filename
The following step by step wizard will g: The following step by step wizard will guide you through configuring your whistleblowing site.
The key code is either invalid or the su: Šifra ključa je neveljavna ali pa je naznanitvi potekla časovna omejitev.
The level of this alarm is HIGH; Tip sub: The level of this alarm is HIGH; Tip submission has been disabled for any potential whistleblower; To re-enable it, add disk space.
The level of this alarm is LOW; don’t pa: The level of this alarm is LOW; don’t panic, your system is doing well.
The level of this alarm is MEDIUM; don’t: The level of this alarm is MEDIUM; don’t panic, but deal with it as soon as possible.
The name of the file and its content can: The name of the file and its content can be intentionally misleading.
The new password must be different from: The new password must be different from the current one.
The number of activities recently detect: The number of activities recently detected appears to be higher than usual.
The proposed PGP key can't be imported: Vnešen PGP ključ ne more biti uvožen
The recipient has already read the lates: Prejemnik je že prebral zadnjo posodobitev
The recipient has not read the latest up: Prejemnik še ni prebral zadnje posodobitve
The server cannot guarantee that a new s: The server cannot guarantee that a new submission can be stored, so submissions have been disabled.
The setting is enabled at a global level: Nastavitev je omogočena na globalni ravni.
The software is developed by the non-pro: To programje smo razvili v nepridobitnem centru Heremes, kjer se ukvarjamo s preglednostjo in človekovimi pravicami v digitalnem svetu.
The specified host does not match any co: Naveden gostitelj se ne ujema z nobenim od nastavljenih.
The submission [%TipNum%] related to con: The submission [%TipNum%] related to context %ContextName% is going to expire in %ExpirationWatch% hours.
The system forces users to change the pa: Sistem prisili uporabnike k menjavi gesla ob prvi prijavi.
The Tor Browser includes various privacy: Tor Browser vsebuje številne dodatke ter izboljšave, ki ga naredijo varnejšega ter v primerjavi z ostalimi brskalniki bolje varuje vašo identiteto.
The upload request exceeds the size limi: Zahteva za pošiljanje datoteke presega velikostno omejitev
The user will be forced to change its pa: Uporabnik bo pozvan k menjavi gesla ob naslednji prijavi.
The username for accessing the server as: The username for accessing the server as the administrator will be 'admin'.
The whistleblower can no longer access t: Žvižgač ne more več dostopati do prispevka
The whistleblower has already read the l: Žvižgač je že prebral zadnjo posodobitev
The whistleblower has not read the lates: Žvižgač še ni prebral zadnje posodobitve
Then, copy and paste the following addre: Potem kopirajte sledeč naslov in ga prilepite v Tor Browser:
They would like you to pay special atten: They would like you to pay special attention to the information and material contained therein. Please keep in mind that whistleblowers often expose themselves to high personal risks for the public interest. Therefore the material that they provide with this tip-off should be considered of high importance.
this configuration only applies to recip: this configuration only applies to recipients
This could be a sign of an attack (for e: This could be a sign of an attack (for example, someone flooding your server with bogus information) or just a usage spike due to an increased visibility of your project.
This custom text is no longer displayed: To prilagojeno besedilo ni več prikazano na platformi. Izvorno besedilo se je spremenilo ali je bilo izbrisano.
This email will be resent in the next ho: This email will be resent in the next hours if the issue is not resolved.
This feature keeps regular people from v: This feature keeps regular people from visiting the platform while it is still under development and should not be used for security purposes. The input password is stored in plaintext on the server.
This file exceeds the maximum upload siz: Velikost datoteke presega dovoljeno velikost za ta strežnik
This happens whenever encryption is unav: To se zgodi, kadar šifriranje ni na voljo.
This interface allows configuration of t: This interface allows configuration of the email templates used for notifying administrators.
This interface allows configuration of the email templates used for notifying recipients.
This interface allows configuring email: Vmesnik omogoča nastavitev poštnih predlog za obveščanje skrbnikov.
This interface may help you understand h: S tega vmesnika lahko pridobite informacije, kako nastaviti svoje vozlišče ter kje lahko poiščete preostale uporabnike GlobaLeaksa in eksperte.
This is a test email sent out from the p: Testno elektronsko sporočilo iz administrativnega vmesnika platforme.
This is a work-in-progress of the admini: Kar boste videli po prijavi kot administrator, je vmesnik v nastajanju.
This is an email to inform you that the: This is an email to inform you that the PGP key of the following users is going to expire or has already expired:
This is an email to inform you that your: To sporočilo vas obvešča, da PGP ključ poteče ali, da je že potekel.
This is an email to notify you of a new: To elektronsko sporočilo vas obvešča o novem komentarju na obstoječem prispevku.
This is an email to notify you of a new message on an existing submission.
This is an email to notify you that a cu: This is an email to notify you that a custodian has authorized you to access to the wistleblowing identity for the submission %TipNum%.
This is an email to notify you that a custodian has denied you access to the wistleblowing identity for the submission %TipNum%.
This is an email to notify you that a re: This is an email to notify you that a recipient has requested access to the whistleblower's identity for the submission %TipNum%
This is an email to notify you that a wh: This is an email to notify you that a whistleblower has selected you as a valuable recipient for his/her submission.
This is an email to notify you that the: This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower for the submission %TipNum% has provided their identity.
This is an email to notify you that the whistleblower of submission %TipNum% has attached new material.
This is the list of the other supported: Tukaj je seznam ostalih podprtih brskalnikov:
This may lead to unintended access to th: This may lead to unintended access to the files by the server administrator or others in case the server is compromised.
This means that if the server running th: This means that if the server running the platform were to be seized, it would be possible to extract the files that have been submitted.
This means that the submitted files will: To pomeni, da bodo posredovane datoteke hranjene na strežniku nekodirane.
This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks so: This platform makes use of GlobaLeaks software specifically designed to protect the identity for submitter and recipient in the exchange of content.
Ta prejemnik ne more biti odstranjen.
Ta prejemnik ne more biti izbran.
This recipient has configured the encryp: Ta prejemnik je nastavil svoj šifrirni ključ.
This recipient has not configured the en: Ta prejemnik še ni nastavil svojega šifrirnega ključa.
This setting affects the security of the: This setting affects the security of the users and must not be used in production.
This won't preserve whistleblower's anon: To ne zagotavlja žvižgačevo anonimnost, zagotavlja pa zaupnost prispevka.
Tip [%TipNum%] is going to expire in %Ex: Tip [%TipNum%] is going to expire in %ExpirationWatch% hours
Title of the confirmation question upon: Title of the confirmation question upon negative answer
To know more about GlobaLeaks Security y: Če si želite izvedeti več o varnosti GlobaLeaksa, vam ponujamo v branje sledeč dokument:
To prevent sending you too many emails,: To prevent sending you too many emails, the system has disabled email notifications until the load returns to normal. In the meantime, you can normally log onto the platform and manually check for new submissions.
To properly organize your project, pleas: Da bi bolje organizirali svoj projekt, prosimo, da preberete spodnja priporočila:
To report a bug or request a feature in: Hrošče, ki ste jih našli ali želje po novih funkcionalnostih GlobaLeaksa nam lahko sporočite, tako da odprete zahtevek in opišete težave, na katere ste naleteli ali razložite svojo zamisel:
Triggered by a score higher than:: Triggered by a score higher than:
Tweak this setting only if you know what: Tweak this setting only if you know what you are doing.
Unless the whistleblower checks the subm: V kolikor žvižgač ne preveri prispevka v tem času, bo njegov dostop do prispevka potekel.
Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It: Use the 16 digit key code to log in. It will allow you to view any messages we sent you, and also to add extra info.
Waiting for the file(s) to finish upload: Waiting for the file(s) to finish uploading.
We do not discriminate based on race and: Ne zanimajo nas vaša barva kože, narodnost, spol ... Diskriminacijo izvajamo zgolj nad računalniki, da bi onemogočili avtomatizirano interakcijo in z njo povezane nevšečnosti. :)
We will try to get back to you as soon a: We will try to get back to you as soon as possible!
Welcome! Choose a strong password to act: Dobrodošli! Izberite močno geslo za aktivacijo vašega računa.
What is the topic of your whistleblowing: What is the topic of your whistleblowing project?
When the option is re-enabled the spoole: Ko je možnost ponovno omogočena, bo e-pošta, ki je v čakanju, odposlana.
Which of the following statements is tru: Katera od navedenih trditev je pravilna?
Without a valid PGP key, the system will: Brez veljavnega PGP ključa, sistem ne more pošiljati kodiranih sporočil.
Without a valid PGP key, the system won': Without a valid PGP key, the system won't be able to encrypt data provided to you.
You are aware of the risks involved. Go: You are aware of the risks involved. Go ahead, but consider yourself warned.
You are connecting to the server without: Z vozliščem se povezujete neanonimno, toda to vozlišče podpira zgolj anonimne naznanitve.
Nimate dovoljenja za dodajanje novih datotek.
You are receiving this email to suggest: You are receiving this email to suggest you to look into this issue and determine if the origin is legit or malicious.
You are running an unsupported and poten: Uporabljate nepodprt in potencialno ranljiv brskalnik.
You are strongly advised to download and: Svetujemo, da prenesete in namestite Tor brskalnik.
You are strongly advised to visit this s: resno priporočamo, da stran obiščete prek Tor omrežja z uporabo Tor Browserja in tako zaščitite svojo identiteto.
You can reach GlobaLeaks's support chat: Podpora za GlobaLeaks je dosegljiva prek IRC klepeta na kanalu #globaleaks OFTC strežnika.
You have not set up your encryption key,: You have not set up your encryption key, so the files will not be encrypted prior to being stored on the server.
You have succesfully completed the platf: You have succesfully completed the platform wizard. You are now ready to further tweak the platform with the admin interface.
You should extend its validity and updat: You should extend its validity and update the key present on the platform, or upload a new key.
